member.name: T:Info.Blockchain.API.BlockExplorer.BlockExplorer
member.summary: The BlockExplorer class reflects the functionality documented at https://blockchain.info/api/blockchain_api. It can be used to query the block chain, fetch block, transaction and address data, get unspent outputs for an address etc.

member.summary: Gets a list of blocks at the specified height. Normally, only one block will be returned, but in case of a chain fork, multiple blocks may be present.

member.exception: If the server returns an error

member.exception: If the server returns an error

member.summary: Subscribe to balance update notification whenever a transaction occur on the address
member.param: Your blockchain.info receive payments v2 api key
The address you will like to monitor
The callback URL to be notified when payment is made
The operation type you would like to receive notifications for ('SPEND' | 'RECEIVE' | 'ALL').
The number of confirmations the transaction needs to have before a notification is sent.

Label for the first address in the wallet
